typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Consultant as string,
		Affaire as string,
		DtStaffing as date,
		NbJours as double,
		Client as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'excel',
	container: 'conteneurblob',
	fileName: 'Planning_ODS.xlsx',
	sheetName: 'Export',
	firstRowAsHeader: true) ~> XLSStaffing
XLSStaffing sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SQLPlanning
